typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		last_trade_price as double,
		timestamp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(last_trade_price = toFloat(last_trade_price)) ~> ModifyColumns2
ModifyColumns2 derive(timestamp = toDate(timestamp)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(timestamp),
	last_trade_price = mean(last_trade_price)) ~> Dailyprice
Dailyprice sink(input(
		timestamp as string,
		last_trade_price as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	mapColumn(
		Date_price = timestamp,
		Price = last_trade_price
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
